item.title: Thoughts of this bio
item.description: Robert Chu - Devops Task static site generator chosen Why Hugo, not Jekyll more straightforward (installing themes and itself) binary (easier) installation faster builds Go built built-in live reload server Useful Features (e.g. Menus, sitemaps) Thriving community (The most Github stars in all static site generator) Why Erblog as theme mobile responsive posts showed in the landing pages

item.title: Happy Birthday to BM
item.description: A scholarship A letter from my email says that I have got a scholarship.

item.title: Happy Birthday to BM
item.description: Happy Birthday to BM! Happy Birthday to you, Be happy and healthy!

item.title: I got my first salary
item.description: I got my first salary In this semester, I am a TA for C Language Programming. Today I got my first salary in my life. I felt proud of myself.
